# xmft Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    xmft = {
      source = "jdavanne/xmft"
    }
  }
}

provider "xmft" {
  product  = "st"
  alias    = "st1"
  host     = "https://host:8444"
  username = "admin"
  password = "admin*"
}

provider "xmft" {
  product  = "cft"
  alias    = "cft1"
  host     = "https://host:1768"
  username = "admin"
  password = "changeme"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String) Example provider attribute
- `product` (String, Sensitive)

### Optional

- `additional_attributes` (Map of String)
- `password` (String, Sensitive)
- `username` (String)
